24UpdateGh is a YouTube channel of Ghana’s top entertainment and news site, that follows current affairs in Ghana and beyond. We deliver captivating and engaging entertainment, videos, and news that drives social conversations.

Gives you the best, Ghana news, celebrity entertainment news, Trending news & Answers to Speculations as well as Global News. With our amazing and beautiful stories we cover on 24UpdateGh( Hub for Entertainment , Urban Lifestyle & Pop Culture),We bring you what others dare do. 
 
It’s a place to stay up to date with trending content across a growing array of topics. With most original content focused on African pop-culture. Stay tuned to discover the quirkiest of events, the meatiest gossip all under one dot com. Happy Viewing!
